Governing

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

T
Deprecated

This article is about a feature, subsystem, or proposal that has been deprecated by new developments. Currently its only purpose is as an archive but this page may be removed.
Do not add to this article, instead add to the current version of the article.


In the world of peragro there are several island sthat can be governed.By default these islands are governed by the GM team.

Governance

Governance can be won by winning a blockade.The winning faction may appoint a president that will be the ruler of the island.The president will by default own all non-player owned buildings and may in the future be able to build more buildings on designated areas's.

Ruling Council

The ruling council are the ministres of certain departments. They will be given one or more tasks by the president and will recieve authority in their respective fields.
